questions.question: What is the title of the article published in the Journal of the American Chemical Society that discusses the structure and magnetic properties of nickel and cobalt hippurates?
questions.answer: Metal ion complexes of .alpha.-amido acids. 1. Structure and magnetic properties of the nickel and cobalt hippurates. Pseudo-one-dimensional magnetic systems

questions.question: Who are the authors of the article discussing the structure and magnetic properties of nickel and cobalt hippurates published in 2002?
questions.answer: Maurice M. Morelock, Mary L. Good, Louis M. Trefonas, David Karraker, Lutfollah Maleki, Helen R. Eichelberger, Richard Majeste, John Dodge

questions.answer: No, it was published online on 1st May 2002.

questions.question: Given the article's DOI, can it be considered a unique identifier for the research on nickel and cobalt hippurates?
questions.answer: Yes, the DOI 10.1021/ja00511a014 serves as a unique identifier.

questions.question: Based on the publication dates, was the article on nickel and cobalt hippurates published in the same year electronically and in print?
questions.answer: No, it was published in print in 1979 and electronically in 2002.
